item.title: Revisiting the Test-Time Scaling of o1-like Models: Do they Truly Possess Test-Time Scaling Capabilities?
item.description: Contrary to popular belief, longer reasoning chains don’t always boost Large Language Model (LLM) accuracy; this research reveals that parallel scaling with shorter solutions outperforms sequential sc…
